## [Spatial Statistics for Data Science: Theory and Practice with R](https://www.paulamoraga.com/book-spatial/)

By [Paula Moraga](https://www.paulamoraga.com/book-spatial/index.html)

Added Tue November 7th, 2023

**What is this?**

**Excerpt from book:** *Spatial Statistics for Data Science: Theory and Practice with R* describes statistical methods, modeling approaches, and visualization techniques to analyze spatial data using R.
The book starts by providing a comprehensive overview of the types of spatial data and R packages for spatial data retrieval, manipulation, and visualization.
Then, it provides a detailed explanation of the theoretical concepts of spatial statistics, along with fully reproducible examples demonstrating how to simulate, describe, and analyze areal, geostatistical, and point pattern data in various applications.
